title: What Do You Wish For?
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Hey, I brought tanzaku for Tanabata!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Thanks, Ayumu-san! Let’s write our wishes on them!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>What should I wish for... Hmm, I definitely have to wish for this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>What did you write down?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Me? I, um, wish to be able to keep performing as a school idol and putting smiles on everyone’s faces.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby is wishing for the same thing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I see. Then, wouldn’t our wishes be twice as likely to come true?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Definitely!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufu. I’m looking forward to what’s ahead of us!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yup! To put on many more live concerts as part of Aqours, Ruby will keep doing her Rubesty!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
